suggested_next_actions.action: Check Compliance Status of a Document
suggested_next_actions.description: Get detailed compliance status for any document. For example: 'Check the compliance status of document ed9dbabf-517f-4a77-b3f4-dc5b8c44be9c'
Analyze a document against a specific framework (GDPR, SOC2, or HIPAA). For example: 'Run a comprehensive GDPR check on document b2d19fb8-15a7-473c-9141-f743394eebf6'
Create a new compliance document like privacy policy, security policy, or incident response plan. For example: 'Draft a GDPR privacy policy for my SaaS product'
